summary: I decided to put Snow Villiers in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center]So I attempted to make Snow Villiers and put him in Skyrim:
 
I didn't use a custom race although I should have

Because he would look amazing with Genox's Face Textures


[img]https://img00.deviantart.net/0414/i/2013/158/3/1/snow_villiers_wallpaper___lightning_returns_by_sraointe-d6839gg.jpg[/img]


He's wearing the armor pictured.  along with his necklace I'll be updating the mod with his own unique summon
(probably Stiria or Nix as close as I can get in Skyrim )
 Other than KS hair, and Genox's or some other fine face textures
+ The outfit I need for Nix (his summon ) --> Will use a lot of the attacks Shiva uses in my FFSkyrim mod
I will not include body files... Because we're not suppose to redistribute Shape Atlas for Men


If anyone want's to improve on the file/ translate it
or wants to make him look like his younger self
*~*~*~I support you~*~*~*


To get him to look like my character:
I use pretty face for men --SAM edition by Don
Shape Atlas for men
KS Hair
CBBE for his Summon
Pretty face CBBE by TKTK


[img]http://i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii198/lightningagito156/Final%20Fantasy%20XIII/FF13%20Summon%20Shiva/034.jpg[/img]﻿
(Stiria)


*** I might make his boyfriend Gadot too lol ***

Credits:
CBBE版 [その他]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1078908772]Lightning Returns - Snow Villiers Outfit (Steam Workshop)[/url] by notkiionohi
KS Hair
Pretty Face TKTK
Pretty Face SAM-Edition Don


[/center]
author: VValentour
